originalText.text: Dr. Soman provides outstanding dental care to assist me in maintaining healthy dental hygiene. My visits are four times a year and I am always seen promptly, given expert care and guidance, with compassion.  Lisa, his dental hygienist, is exemplary and caring. I am grateful to Dr. Soman and his team for their wonderful care over the years. I feel very fortunate.

text.text: Dr. Soman provides outstanding dental care to assist me in maintaining healthy dental hygiene. My visits are four times a year and I am always seen promptly, given expert care and guidance, with compassion.  Lisa, his dental hygienist, is exemplary and caring. I am grateful to Dr. Soman and his team for their wonderful care over the years. I feel very fortunate.

originalText.text: I have been visiting Dr. Soman and Liza (Dental hygienist) for more than 20 years. They are incredibly professional and definitely know what they are doing. I have recommended  them to my colleagues, friends and family members. They are as satisfied as I am. Thank you!!!

text.text: I have been visiting Dr. Soman and Liza (Dental hygienist) for more than 20 years. They are incredibly professional and definitely know what they are doing. I have recommended  them to my colleagues, friends and family members. They are as satisfied as I am. Thank you!!!

originalText.text:
Dr. Soman is an excellent professional.  In addition to this, he is a modest and quiet person with high ethical standards.
The critique below likely relates to a period when his office suffered the sudden loss of his invaluable office assistant.  With a new friendly able assistant, the office is again doing well.
Dr. Soman has been my dentist through thick and thin. He handled my dental disaster (fall from scooter which bashed in teeth!)  promptly, compassionately and with the highest standards. Modest, calm, reliable.

originalText.text: Dr. Soman is a great Periodontist!  I came here for a second opinion.  He made me feel at ease about the tooth extraction and done in an almost painless manner.  He is old school, dedicated and reliable.  His hours are until 6pm during the weekdays.

text.text: Dr. Soman is a great Periodontist!  I came here for a second opinion.  He made me feel at ease about the tooth extraction and done in an almost painless manner.  He is old school, dedicated and reliable.  His hours are until 6pm during the weekdays.

originalText.text: We love Dr. Soman. He has been my periodontist for the last 10 years. My son uses him too. He does a very thorough scaling and cleans your teeth. He is the best periodontist!
